name: @waysidemapping/pinhead
description: Quality public domain icons for your map pins

scripts.dist: npm run check_icons && npm run build_dist && npm run check_changelog && cp metadata/changelog.json dist/changelog.json && cp metadata/external_sources.json dist/external_sources.json
scripts.build_docs: node scripts/build_docs.js && npm view @waysidemapping/pinhead time --json > docs/npm_publish_dates.json
scripts.build_docs_for_preview: npm run build_docs && npm run dist && node scripts/build_preview_docs.js
